body:
Are `llnl.util` or `spack.util.executable` also available as separate projects?

I found them really convenient for writing cmd wrappers and would like to re-use them in other projects such as [PIConGPU](https://github.com/ComputationalRadiationPhysics/picongpu/).

Did you consider re-publishing them as a separate little python lib, so we can set them as requirements? (Otherwise copying & modifying the files would also be possible as long as we keep the license header since we are LGPL compatible.)
title: Reuse of utils?
